lines.text: [Mike is a customer at a men's clothing store]
It fits you like a glove!
It should fit me like a suit.

[Picks up dog's head mask]
What's this?
Oh, I found that on Lathrop's head. The murderer must have put it there after he shot him.
What did he do that for?
Oh, maybe he liked Airedales, I don't know.
I had a dog like that once, it'd eat anything, it was very fond of children.
The stork that delivered you should be arrested for peddling dope.
Oh, a cherry coke will fix ya up.
Ah... you'd find rust on the pearly gates.
